room_title: Escape room "New Orleans Escape" by Challenge Escape Rooms in New York
review: I booked a room for four of us and it was so much fun! We didn't "escape the room" in time but this activity really pushes you to think. Would recommended it to anyone in a group looking for something new. We loved it so much, we are gonna book another one of their other locations soon.The staff is so friendly and helpful!!!

room_title: Escape room "New Orleans Escape" by Challenge Escape Rooms in New York
review: I came here with three friends for a pre-Birthday activity. We had the most fun. We didn't figure out the room in time but we certainly had a blast trying. We will be back and up for another challenge!!!!!

room_title: Escape room "New Orleans Escape" by Challenge Escape Rooms in New York
review: This was the second challenge room I ever experienced. I entered with two friends and another group of four amazing humans! It was helpful to have many people involved in collaborating, asking questions and working together to bounce ideas and ask questions about the provided clues and props. At times, it is challenging to work in a small space, so it is important to communicate and share distinct roles for each member to have a valuable part in the problem/mystery-solving process. This was an amazing, rigorous and worthy escape room that pushed my academic, logical and critical thinking in a beautiful way! I highly recommend all humans to partake in this awesome challenge.
